Source.Name: rar
Source.Description: This is the RAR archiver from Eugene Roshal. It supports multiple volume archives and damage protection. It can also create SFX-archives. There are versions which run on DOS, Windows (3.1x,95,NT), FreeBSD, BSDI. *This program is shareware and you must register it after 40 days of use.*

Package.Name: rar
